tossup_question: -   –  Which of the following organisms would use the highest percentage of its energy budget for homeostatic regulation?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W)Marine hydra
X)Desert bird
Y)Desert insect
Z)Marine jellyfish
bonus_question: -   –  Identify all of the following three structures that are examples of convergent evolution: 1) Whale flippers and human hands; 2) Butterfly wings and bird wings; 3) Spider pedipalps and shrimp antennae.
